billing_zip.description: The ZIP code associated with the billing address.

charge.description: The charge associated with the payment.

closed_reason.description: The reason for closing the transaction.

created.description: The timestamp when the review was created.

updated.description: The timestamp when the review was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the review.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the reviewer.

ip_address_location.description: Location details of the reviewer's IP address.

city.description: The city of the reviewer's IP address location.

country.description: The country of the reviewer's IP address location.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the reviewer's IP address location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the reviewer's IP address location.

region.description: The region of the reviewer's IP address location.

livemode.description: Indicates if the review is in live mode.

object.description: The type of object being reviewed.

open.description: Indicates if the review is open.

opened_reason.description: The reason for opening the review.

payment_intent.description: The payment intent associated with the review.

reason.description: The reason for the review being conducted.

browser.description: The browser used by the reviewer.

device.description: The device used by the reviewer.

platform.description: The platform used by the reviewer.

version.description: The version of the platform used by the reviewer.
